page.title: 02LIFE IN WALPOLE CONT.
page.content: THE CHASE _________ Between Walpole St. Peter,Walpole St. Andrew is Walpole Chase.In July 1985 there is a school at one end and the old Manor House at the other.Builders have just begun to build 80 houses and bungalows opposite the school and fundraising is well under way for a new village hall/community centre. HOUSING _______ Houses are clustered around the churches but there is much ribbon development and some people live a considerable distance from shops.There is a mixture of council and private housing but the interesting thing is the size of peoples gardens.There are many large gardens which people use to grow their own produce.
